name: Super Marie Adventure
description:
You love Classic Platform. You love old school game. You would like to return childhood memory, Our game Super Bros Adventures is best choice for you. Super Marie lived in candy world from their childhood.

* 3 Mode : Classic Adventure mode, Run mode and Puzzle mode.

Features:
* Chat Global.
* Global Leaderboards.
* Just tap the button to let the boy jump.
* Help boy to pass all the challenges to where you need to cross different obstacles.
* Run to the end of the candy castle to pass the level.
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.
* Suitable for all age.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week.

Super Adventure Of Marie is a FREE game with addictive and exhilarating adventure game.
